QuestData.Title: The Fourth Wall, er, War
QuestData.Description:
It's time for the next act of your theatrical introduction: the Grand Drama Of Azereth!
Azeroth. Right. All these worlds are hard to tell apart.
Help set the stage, then come back here. You'll need to play a few other characters before you appear as yourself again.
Get a move on! We have a lot to cover!
QuestData.LogDescription: Set the Stage then help the reenactment of events after the Legion's fall.
QuestData.RewardText:
I can honestly say I have never seen a performance quite like this.
Now... On to our grand finale! A battle for your world that is certain to make the court sit up and take notice!
